posts.post_content:
Posted By: Patrick McMenemy
I'm interested in purchasing some T213s with Minor League team designations:

Bresnahan (Toledo)
Myers (New Haven)
Street (Nashville)

Prefer creaseless examples, but will consider all. Back damage is O.K.

I can purchase outright or have many items available.

Thanks in advance,

Patrick

Posted By: James Feagin

Good luck!

James

Posted By: Patrick McMenemy
Add Ira Thomas to the want list as well. 

I have many items to trade, and I'll make it worthwhile for those who have nice examples available. I can buy outright as well.

Thanks in advance,

Patrick
